Structs/BeaconInfo.html#/s:6Parrot10Beac.name: params
Structs/BeaconInfo.html#/s:6Parrot10Beac.abstract: The BeaconParams that will be used to populate the underlying CLBeaconRegion’s major/minor values.

Structs/BeaconInfo.html.name: BeaconInfo
Structs/BeaconInfo.html.abstract: A struct to help package and serialize information regarding a CLBeaconRegion

Extensions/CLBeaconRegion.html.name: CLBeaconRegion
Extensions/CLBeaconRegion.html.abstract: An extension that allows CLBeaconRegions to be used with BeaconRegionParams

Enums/BeaconAdvertisingState.html#/s:6Pa.name: queued
Enums/BeaconAdvertisingState.html#/s:6Pa.abstract: Waiting for the CBManagerState to change from .poweredOff, .unknown, or .resetting.

Enums/BeaconRegionParams.html#/s:6Parrot.name: both
Enums/BeaconRegionParams.html#/s:6Parrot.abstract: Both a major and a minor value are provided

Enums/BeaconRegionParams.html.name: BeaconRegionParams
Enums/BeaconRegionParams.html.abstract: An enum describing what the major/minor values of the underlying CLBeaconRegion will be.

Enums/BeaconAdvertisingState.html.name: BeaconAdvertisingState
Enums/BeaconAdvertisingState.html.abstract: An enum that describes the state of a BeaconAdvertiser.

Enums/BeaconAdvertiserError.html.name: BeaconAdvertiserError
Enums/BeaconAdvertiserError.html.abstract: An enum describing an error originating from a BeaconAdvertiser.

Classes/BeaconAdvertiser.html#/s:6Parrot.name: init(uuid:identifier:params:)
Classes/BeaconAdvertiser.html#/s:6Parrot.abstract: Initializer that creates the underlying CLBeaconRegion that is advertised.

Classes/BeaconMonitor.html#/s:6Parrot13B.name: init(uuid:identifier:params:)
Classes/BeaconMonitor.html#/s:6Parrot13B.abstract: Initializer that accepts the CLBeaconRegion to be monitored.

Classes/BeaconMonitor.html.name: BeaconMonitor
Classes/BeaconMonitor.html.abstract: A class that allows a CLBeaconRegion to be monitored.

Classes/BeaconAdvertiser.html.name: BeaconAdvertiser
Classes/BeaconAdvertiser.html.abstract: A class that allows a CLBeaconRegion to be advertised.
